translations: （动物因害怕、痛苦等）吠叫；发出短促而尖利的叫喊声

sentences.sentence: I hated the things - they were so aggressive - but their yipping and yapping often alerted the guards to my approach, and they would switch on their searchlight and see me coming.
sentences.translation: 我恨狗——他们攻击性太强——但是吠声连连，让警卫觉察到有人来了。他们会打开探照灯，看着我过去。
